summary: This batch represents work across multiple product teams focusing on one-time purchase (OTP) functionality rollout, meal plan customization features, and system migrations. Major efforts include building OTP checkout flows for Factor, implementing dynamic pricing for portion changes, migrating GreenChef NL customers, and various technical cleanup tasks including feature flag removal and form validation fixes.

decisions.what: Update minimum calorie limit from 88 to 54 to support new 60 kcal SKUs
decisions.rationale: New SKUs for 60 kcal products require lower threshold to render correct plan options

decisions.what: Won't fix utility for extracting properties from useCurrentSubscription
decisions.rationale: Decided not to proceed with this optimization approach

decisions.what: Won't investigate discount comms rendering issue in Price Presentation Service
decisions.rationale: Currently there is a 40% black friday voucher that takes precedence

decisions.what: Migrate existing customers to VMSU product family for OTP pricing
decisions.rationale: Required to enable one-time-purchase functionality with proper pricing structure

decisions.what: Add Shopify domains to allowed CORS origins
decisions.rationale: Fix CORS error when requesting auth/email/status from Shopify

initiatives.name: One-Time Purchase (OTP) Rollout
initiatives.description: Enable customers to make one-time purchases without subscription commitment, including checkout flows, pricing migration, email journeys, and UI components

initiatives.name: GreenChef NL Migration/Closure
initiatives.description: Manage GreenChef Netherlands market closure including customer migration banners and feature flags

initiatives.name: Product Detail Page Enhancement
initiatives.description: Build carousel functionality in PDP header with images and videos from Contentful

initiatives.name: Dynamic Plan Pricing
initiatives.description: Implement dynamic price updates when users change portion percentages in meal plans

initiatives.name: Market Innovation & Optimization Team Formation
initiatives.description: Update infrastructure ownership and team details across repositories for newly formed MIO team

blockers.description: Helm Charts and Comply Files update blocked until HR and security update Workday and create Azure group
blockers.impact: Cannot complete team ownership migration for MIO team infrastructure

blockers.description: OTP menu creation on staging deemed irrelevant as menus created on live

entities.context: Leading OTP customer migration and checkout fixes

entities.name: VMSU product family
entities.context: Product family for OTP pricing migration

entities.name: RTE Systems
entities.context: Previous squad name being migrated to MIO

technical_patterns.pattern: Feature flag cleanup after full rollout
technical_patterns.context: Removing tpt_meals_selection_migration flag after preferences-based meal selection is fully deployed
Updating Last Name form validation to match backend's minimum 2 character requirement to prevent order placement failures

technical_patterns.pattern: Service Level Objectives (SLOs) for user experience monitoring
technical_patterns.context: Implementing SLOs for Factor Form experience to automatically detect sustained drops in customer success rates

technical_patterns.pattern: Dynamic pricing calculation on UI interaction
technical_patterns.context: Adjusting plan prices in real-time when users change portion percentages
Adding allowed origins for Shopify integration with authentication endpoints

technical_patterns.pattern: Customer data migration with rollback plan
technical_patterns.context: Documented migration steps for moving customers to VMSU product family with ability to roll back

technical_patterns.pattern: Stale data handling from deliveries endpoint
technical_patterns.context: Price breakdown displaying incorrect cadence due to discrepant data from deliveries API

technical_patterns.pattern: Conditional UI rendering based on subscription status
technical_patterns.context: Checkout type selectors hidden for active SnS users, only showing subscription items

work_themes: One-Time Purchase enablement and customer migration
Feature flag and technical debt cleanup
Form validation and data consistency fixes
Team reorganization and infrastructure ownership updates

dependencies.context: Workday updates and Azure group creation required for infrastructure ownership migration
CRM needs to create OTP email journeys for customer communication
Form validation must align with backend requirements to prevent order placement failures
UI depends on accurate data from deliveries API for displaying correct prices and cadence
Carousel images and videos sourced from Contentful after first slide from CCM
Shopify domains need CORS allowlist for email status endpoint access
